name: The Year of Florid Mistakes
description:
Enter the City of Murmur. It is its darkest hour, and you are its only hope. The fate of your parents and everything you know is in your tiny hands. Armed only with your wits (or are you?), save Murmur from the fearsome creature that holds them in a state of panic. Filled with yuks (and yaks).  This interactive fiction piece was created for InkJam 2019.

Contains some light horror elements.
